sentences.sContent: Over the years, the stream had scoured out a round pool in the rock.
sentences.sCn: 经年累月，溪水在岩石上冲出了一个圆圆的水潭。

synos.tran: 擦，冲刷；洗涤剂；（畜类等的）腹泻

remMethod.val: 看谁擦洗 (scour) 得干净， 要打分 (score) 的 → 擦洗

words.tran: 擦洗者，洗刷器；泻药；打光机

trans.tranOther: to form a hole by continuous movement over a long period
